root.name: Jupiter's Masterdrive
root.description: Jupiter's Masterdrive is a top-down racing game set in the future, on Jupiter and its moons to be precise. The game can be played two-player split-screen and the game focusses more on the arcade aspect than the racing itself. TheÂ controls are straightforward and the cards can be upgraded with weapons and other technical upgrades. If the game is played as a full season, the players can earn money based on their performance in the race and spend it on their car in between the races.
